title: John Garamendi - Wikipedia
snippet: John Raymond Garamendi (/ˌɡærəˈmɛndi/ GARR-ə-MEN-dee; born January 24, 1945) is an American businessman, politician and member of the Democratic Party who has represented areas of Northern California between San Francisco and Sacramento, including the cities of Fairfield and Vacaville in the United States House of Representatives since 2009.

title: Rep. John Garamendi [D-CA8, 2023-2026], Representative for California's 8th Congressional District - GovTrack.us
snippet: Analysis and Commentary Nov. 9, 2025: The Government Shutdown at Day 40: Where are we and how did we get here? » ... Garamendi is the representative for California’s 8th congressional district (view map) and is a Democrat. He has served since Jan. 3, 2023.
